definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: 3rd son of Shem ´[[א]] Ge 10:22, Ge 10:24, Ge 11:12, Ge 11:13, 1Ch 1:17, 1Ch 1:18, 1Ch 1:24; [[אַרְפַּכְשָָׁד]] Ge 11:10, Ge 11:11; doubtless a geogr. name (deriv. & mng. dub., Thesder. fr. 0urfah;un boundary (stem 0’arifa define, limit), cf. also Eth. 0araft: wall, + [[כשׁד]] = [[כֶּשֶׂד]], i.e. Chaldean; so Schr:COT Ge 10:22 who identifies with Babylonia (cf. Ge 11:12 f. & [[אוּר כַּשְׂדִּים]] v:Ge 11:28; v:Ge 11:31); v. another interpr. Dl:Pa 255; acc. to most = Arrapachitis on Upper Zab, NE. Fr. Nineveh, As. Arbaḫa, Armen. Albak Lag:Armen. Stud. 55 & reff. so Bo MV, Di Ge 10:22 Lag:Sy i. 54 Nö:ZMG 1882, 182; but As. Arbaḫa is unfavourable to this).
